name: .PSXPRJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .PSXPRJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A PSXPRJ file is an image-editing project created by Photoscape X, an image editor developed by Mooii Tech. It contains an image and a record of any adjustments, effects, or transformations applied to that image. Saving projects as PSXPRJ files allows users to revert or continue making changes to an image.

content: Photoscape X is a free image editor available for Windows and macOS. It allows users to import images and apply adjustments, effects, and transformations to them. For example, a user could use Photoscape X to crop, recolor, and add a text mask to an image.

If a user wants to continue editing an image in Photoscape X in the future, they can save their current editing project as a PSXPRJ file. This retains a record of the modifications the user has made to the image, so they can remove them, adjust them, or compare their edited image to the original.
To save a Photoscape X project as a PSXPRJ file:
From the Save window, select Save Project....
Name and save your PSXPRJ file.

instructions: You can open a PSXPRJ file with Photoscape X (Windows, Mac). To do so, select the Open link that appears on the program's main screen. Then, navigate to and open your PSXPRJ file.
After opening a PSXPRJ file in Photoscape X, you can save it as a .JPEG, .PNG, .GIF, .BMP, .TIFF, or .WEBP file. To do so:
From the Save window, select Save As....
Choose the format and location in which you want to save your edited image.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
